data.route_analysis: Traveling via train or car from major cities. Car rentals available. Winter sports available in local resorts.
data.pricing_trends: Winter season sees increased prices for accommodations, especially in December and February.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best visited from December to March for winter activities.
data.booking_windows: Travelers should book 1-3 months in advance to secure decent rates.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Traveling via train or car from major cities. Car rentals available. Winter sports available in local resorts.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Best visited from December to March for winter activities.
destination_insights.climate: Cold temperatures, snow cover. Warm clothing and gear recommended.
destination_insights.culture: Rich traditions, winter festivals, and culinary offerings including borscht and blini.
destination_insights.attractions: Visit Kizhi Island, Saimaa Lake, and local spas with traditional Russian baths.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Winter season sees increased prices for accommodations, especially in December and February.
market_insights.booking_windows: Travelers should book 1-3 months in advance to secure decent rates.
market_insights.demand: High demand during New Year and Christmas holidays.
market_insights.competition: Other winter destinations include the Alps and Scandinavian countries.

trend_insights.market_trends: Increasing trend for eco-tourism and wellness travel.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers prioritize safety and local experiences.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Emerging competition from alternative winter sports destinations in Eastern Europe.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Seasonal discounts are offered by some resorts to attract visitors in low-peak months.
